ai_highlights.headline: New 3D Chip Design Stacks Memory and Compute
ai_highlights.summary: Researchers have developed a 3D chip architecture that vertically stacks memory and computing elements, reducing data travel distance and significantly increasing speed compared to traditional flat designs.

ai_highlights.headline: Anthropic's 'Claude Cowork' Launch Shocks Markets
ai_highlights.summary: The release of Anthropic's 'Claude Cowork' has triggered a massive sell-off in the IT sector, wiping out billions in market value as investors react to the potential disruption of white-collar work.

ai_highlights.headline: AI-Powered 'a-Heal' Wearable for Wound Recovery
ai_highlights.summary: A new device called 'a-Heal' integrates AI, imaging, and bioelectronics to continuously monitor wounds and diagnose healing stages, promising faster recovery times.

nvda.news: Trading around $174; caught in broader sector volatility following AI agent releases.

goog.news: Shares sank after announcing a massive $180 billion spending forecast, raising concerns about the cost of the AI arms race.

market_data.summary: Global tech stocks face heavy selling pressure (the 'Claude Cowork' effect) and concerns over ballooning AI capital expenditures from majors like Alphabet.

tech_headlines.headline: Washington Post Cuts 300 Jobs in Global Layoffs
tech_headlines.summary: The Jeff Bezos-owned publication announced significant workforce reductions, cutting about one-third of its newsroom staff.

tech_headlines.headline: Alphabet's $180B Spending Plan Rattles Investors
tech_headlines.summary: Google's parent company forecasts massive capital expenditure for 2026, signaling an 'all-in' approach to AI that has made Wall Street nervous about margins.

tech_headlines.headline: Global Markets React to AI Valuation Concerns
tech_headlines.summary: A heavy sell-off in software and crypto markets is being driven by renewed fears over AI valuations and the tangible economic impact of new AI agents.
